item.title: Metasploit Wrap-Up 05/16/2025
item.description:
New modules for everyone This week’s release is packed with new module content. We have RCE modules for Car Rental System 1.0, Wordpress plugins SureTriggers, User Registration and Membership. We also have a persistence module for LINQPad software and an auxiliary module for POWERCOM UPSMON PRO. We have also added support for 32-bit architectures to our execute-assembly post module, which now supports injection of both 64-bit and 32-bit .NET assembly binaries.
